mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(freeboard_no, freeboard_writer, freeboard_title, freeboard_content) values(#{freeboardNo}, #{freeboardWriter}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardContent})
mapper.select: select freeboard_no, freeboard_writer, freeboard_title, freeboard_read, freeboard_like, freeboard_writedate from freeboard where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 and freeboard_state = 'N' order by freeboard_no desc
select freeboard_no, freeboard_writer, freeboard_title, freeboard_read, freeboard_like, freeboard_writedate from freeboard where freeboard_state = 'N' order by freeboard_no desc
select freeboard_no, freeboard_writer, freeboard_title, freeboard_read, freeboard_content, freeboard_like, freeboard_writedate from freeboard where freeboard_no = #{freeboardNo}
mapper.update: update freeboard set freeboard_read = freeboard_read + 1 where freeboard_no = #{freeboardNo}
update freeboard set freeboard_title = #{freeboardTitle}, freeboard_content = #{freeboardContent}, freeboard_updatedate = sysdate where freeboard_no = #{freeboardNo}
update freeboard set freeboard_state = 'Y' where freeboard_no = #{freeboardNo}
